doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 33 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 150[Air Date: 5/14/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 33 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 150[Air Date: 5/14/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay rights national lobby2. Department of Defense wishes to have access to its service member's HTLVIII results3. Barney Frank speaks at the Conference for Gay and Lesbian JewsCOMMERCIAL: Brunch Buddies4. NYC Mayor Ed Koch and employment civil rights, Salvation Army joins court case5. Chicago Archbishop OKs gay civil rights6. Andy Humm discusses Ed Koch's trip to RomeCOMMERCIAL: Chamberlain and Associates, career service professionals6. Washington state highschooler harasses lesbians, starts school movement against them7. Conference on gay seniors, Senior Action in a Gay Environment8. Dallas news8. Sports, interview with Ron Keel of the MCAA Bowling League9. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Gary MacDonald, Executive Director of the Federation of AIDS Related Organizations, discusses funding10. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Interview with President of the Gay and Lesbian Press Association, Susan Cavin and intern, Heather Carjane2. Media reports/current events/cultureCOMMERCIAL: Brunch BuddiesCOMMERCIAL: A Different Light BookstoreCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper3. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape," a gay magazine4. Sybil Bruncheon reads a letterCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"5. Sybil Bruncheon continues letter and closes
